title: The Alpha Drone
description: Discover the rusty drone left behind by Lain's grandfather

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Oh, you found the alpha drone! My grandfather built it years ago.

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: It was supposed to help with farm work, but it's been sitting here rusting for quite some time now.

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Grandpa always said it could plant and harvest crops all on its own... if only someone could figure out how to program it properly.

preDialogues.name: Lain
preDialogues.content: Maybe you could give it a try? It might still work if you know how to code.
